ovdesc.p: "This Table is maintained by the system with all the items (records) created in a project using AA Product Builder.
It is a concat table for the main Table EB.PROJECT.MANAGER
It contains the project id's that are associated (linked) for an application/recordkey"

desc.p: "Describes the project details id, record in the format, ApplicationName * RecordKey * CompanyCode
Holds the project id's that are associated for the recordkey, a single record can be used in multiple projects, all the project id's are listed here
